statements: SELECT * FROM genetic_data WHERE sample_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, test_date, genetic_variant FROM genetic_data WHERE health_risk_assessment = 'High Risk';
SELECT sample_id, patient_name FROM genetic_data WHERE test_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM genetic_data ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT health_risk_assessment FROM genetic_data;
SELECT * FROM genetic_data WHERE sample_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, genetic_variant, test_date FROM genetic_data WHERE health_risk_assessment = 'High';
SELECT sample_id, patient_name, health_risk_assessment FROM genetic_data WHERE test_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM genetic_data WHERE genetic_variant LIKE '%BRCA%' AND health_risk_assessment = 'Moderate';
SELECT patient_name, COUNT(*) AS num_samples FROM genetic_data GROUP BY patient_name HAVING num_samples > 1 ORDER BY num_samples DESC;
SELECT * FROM genetic_tests;
SELECT test_name, test_type FROM genetic_tests ORDER BY test_name ASC;
SELECT test_id, test_name, test_type FROM genetic_tests WHERE test_type = 'DNA Test';
SELECT * FROM genetic_tests WHERE test_id = 3;
SELECT test_name, test_type FROM genetic_tests WHERE test_type = 'Blood Test' ORDER BY test_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM genetic_tests ORDER BY test_name DESC;
SELECT test_name, test_type FROM genetic_tests WHERE test_type = 'Genomics';
SELECT test_id, test_name, test_type FROM genetic_tests WHERE test_type = 'Pharmacogenomics' ORDER BY test_id;
SELECT risk_name, risk_level FROM health_risks WHERE risk_level = 'High';
SELECT risk_name, risk_description FROM health_risks WHERE risk_id IN (1, 3);
SELECT * FROM genetic_tests;
SELECT test_name, test_date FROM genetic_tests WHERE test_id = 1;
SELECT COUNT(test_id) AS total_tests FROM genetic_tests;
SELECT * FROM health_risks ORDER BY risk_level DESC;
SELECT test_name, test_date FROM genetic_tests WHERE test_date >= '2022-01-01' AND test_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM genetic_tests WHERE test_id = 1;
SELECT test_name, test_date FROM genetic_tests WHERE patient_id = 100 ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT genetic_tests.test_name, health_risks.risk_description FROM genetic_tests JOIN health_risks ON genetic_tests.test_id = health_risks.risk_id WHERE health_risks.risk_level = 'High';
SELECT test_results.test_id, test_results.result_value FROM test_results WHERE test_results.result_value > 50 AND result_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT MAX(result_value) AS max_result, MIN(result_value) AS min_result FROM test_results WHERE test_id = 3 AND result_date = '2022-06-15';
SELECT * FROM genetic_tests;
SELECT test_date, test_result FROM genetic_tests WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT study_name, study_description FROM genetic_studies WHERE study_id = 1;
SELECT risk_description FROM health_risks WHERE risk_category = 'Genetic';
SELECT test_id, patient_id, test_date FROM genetic_tests ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM genetic_tests;
SELECT patient_id, test_date, test_result FROM genetic_tests WHERE study_id = 1;
SELECT test_id, patient_id, test_date, test_result FROM genetic_tests WHERE test_result = 'Positive' ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT test_results.result_id, test_results.result_description, genetic_tests.test_result FROM test_results JOIN genetic_tests ON test_results.test_id = genetic_tests.test_id;
SELECT genetic_tests.test_id, genetic_studies.study_name, genetic_studies.study_description FROM genetic_tests JOIN genetic_studies ON genetic_tests.study_id = genetic_studies.study_id;
SELECT * FROM genetic_tests;
SELECT test_name, result FROM genetic_tests WHERE test_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT patient_id, test_name, result FROM genetic_tests ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM health_risks WHERE risk_factor > 0.5;
SELECT patient_name, dob, gender FROM patient_info WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT * FROM genetic_tests WHERE test_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT test_name, result FROM genetic_tests WHERE patient_id = 123 ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, dob, gender FROM patient_info WHERE dob < '1990-01-01' AND gender = 'F';
SELECT variant_name, chromosome, position FROM genetic_variants WHERE allele = 'A' OR allele = 'T';
SELECT study_name, start_date, end_date, researcher_name FROM research_studies ORDER BY start_date ASC, end_date DESC;
